name: Chichen Itza
description:
READ ME PLEASE:

The game runs in 50+ FPS. However, if your game lags while playing in browser, consider downloading the PC version for a better experience. The windows version to be downloaded is available under the WebGL (browser) version.

This is one of my projects done for a coursework. The purpose of this project was to implement various direct (bread-crumbing method) and indirect (paths, lines, reward and denial) guidance methods to guide the player.  The game has been made using Unity 3D.
